c74object.name: crucible
c74object.digest: Selectively updates a dictionary by comparing incoming spans.
c74object.description: The `crucible` object implements a challenger/incumbent system for updating a dictionary. It receives streams of messages from an object like `buildspans`, representing musical spans, and temporarily stores them as a "challenger" span. When a complete span is received, it compares the `rating` of each bar in the challenger span to the corresponding bar in a designated "incumbent" dictionary. The challenger's data will only overwrite the incumbent's and be sent to the outlets if every one of its bar ratings is strictly higher than the incumbent's. If a bar exists in the challenger but not the incumbent, the challenger automatically wins the comparison for that bar.

objarg.name: incumbent_dictionary_name
objarg.digest: The name of the dictionary to use as the incumbent.
objarg.description: The first argument must be the name of a `dict` object that will serve as the incumbent dictionary for comparisons.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.description: When set to 1, a rightmost outlet is created for verbose logging messages, which can be helpful for debugging.

inlet.name: in
inlet.digest: Input for the message stream from buildspans.
inlet.description: The main inlet for receiving messages to trigger the object's parsing and comparison functionality.

inlet.name: in
inlet.description: Receives a float that sets a local bar length, which will override the one specified by the bar buffer. A value of zero or less will cause the object to revert to using the bar buffer.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: For a winning span, outputs the "reach," calculated as the largest bar timestamp in the span plus the current `bar_length`.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: For a winning span, outputs the value associated with the `palette` key.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: For a winning span, this outlet outputs the `bar` part of the selector as an integer for each bar in the span.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: For a winning span, outputs the value associated with the `offset` key.
